case.name: Hem, in the matter of Coulco Trading Pty Ltd (Subjectto Deed of Company Arrangement) (No 2) v Cant (Administrator ofthe Deed of Company Arrangement of Coulco Trading Pty Ltd(Subject to Deed of Company Arrangement)) [2007] FCA 549 (18 April 2007)

citphrases.citphrase: whether unfounded accusation of theft sufficient to constitute damages
whether money earned in mitigation but which cannot be collected should be set off against damages
